description:
The dry-cured ham that Haruno was looking forward to enjoying ended up being used as one of the recipe`s ingredients! With a little convincing from Kako, the group heads out to buy some famous Yatsugatake ham instead. While on the road, they drop by abandoned places and ski areas here and there, enjoying some Kiyosato curry and visiting a variety of stores that sell ham.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Nama Ham Yamanashi Monogatari / Shinrei Spot Hyoui Jiken
The Story of Dry-Cured Ham in Yamanashi / A Haunted Spot and Incident of Possession
生ハム山梨物語 / 心霊スポット憑依事件
